page.title: 12Opinion Survey in S Brent(2)
page.content: {Questions and responses: { {1.Do you like South Brent? Yes 8;"No- better when I was young" 1; "It's different!" 1;"Yes and no!" 1 {2.Would you like more factories? Yes 5; No 4; Don't know 2 {3.What would you change? Nothing 5; More shops 1; More industry 1; Remove yellow lines 1; More for older children 1; Make it like it was when I was young 1; Don't know 1 {4.Would you like more shops? Yes 6; No 5 {5.Do you think the village will grow? Yes 8; No 1;Hope not 1;Don't know 1 {6.Do you think the village is nicely {kept? Yes 10; No 1 {7.Would you like the railway station {to re-open? Yes 10; No 1
